title: Extract and display advanced 5G metrics from gateway API
description:
The T-Mobile gateway API likely returns MORE data than we're showing. Need to:

Investigate and add:
- CQI (Channel Quality Indicator) - CRITICAL for throughput
- MCS (Modulation and Coding Scheme) - directly affects speed
- MIMO layers/rank - n41 supports 4x4 MIMO
- Carrier Aggregation status - combining bands
- Bandwidth allocation (MHz)
- Physical Cell ID (PCI)
- Timing Advance / distance to tower
- DL/UL EARFCN/ARFCN
- Connection mode (NSA vs SA)

These metrics explain WHY signal is good but speed is bad (e.g., low CQI due to interference, or only 2x2 MIMO active).

## Required Permission Updates

```json
{
  "permissions": {
    "allow": [
      "Skill(frontend-design)",
      "Bash(pip install:*)",
      "Bash(speedtest-cli:*)",
      "Bash(bd export:*)",
      "Bash(python server.py:*)",
      "Bash(docker:*)",
      "Bash(docker-compose:*)",
      "Bash(mkdir:*)",
      "Bash(ls:*)",
      "Write"
    ]
  }
}
```

- tmobile-dashboard-p9d: Docker Compose for LGTM stack (needs Write for docker-compose.yml, config files)
- tmobile-dashboard-11c: Project restructuring (needs Write for pyproject.toml, package.json)

## User Action Required

Please manually update .claude/settings.local.json to include Write permissions, then agents can complete the blocked tasks.
